- Heathrow Airport: buses 60, 61, 71, 75, 76, 77, 78 and National Express coach or by train changing at Hayes and Harlington or London Paddington

- Bristol Airport: direct train from Bristol Temple Meads station - there is a shuttle bus to the airport
- Southampton Airport/Bournemouth Airport: train, changing in Reading
- East Midlands Airport: train, changing in London
